titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 which provides that the accumulated earnings tax shall be applied without regard to the number of shareholders in the corporation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/23/1988--Introduced. Repeals a provision of the Internal Revenue Code that subjects corporations to the accumulated earnings tax regardless of the number of shareholders.
